overview: From 2025-09-22 to 2025-09-23, ethereum-optimism/docs had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 20 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Bump next from 14.2.21 to 14.2.32
topPRs.author: dependabot
topPRs.body:
Bumps [next](https://github.com/vercel/next.js) from 14.2.21 to 14.2.32.
Release notes

Sourced from next's releases.

v14.2.32

[!NOTE]
This release is backporting bug fixes. It does not include all pending features/changes on canary.

Core Changes

  • fix router handling when setting a location response header #82588

Credits

Huge thanks to @â€‹ztanner for helping!

Commits
  • 89ee561 v14.2.32
  • 6a974ad [backport v14]: fix router handling when setting a location response header (...
  • 55f7662 v14.2.31
  • 5dd68a5 [backport v14]: fix(next/image): improve and simplify detect-content-type (#8...
  • bcc7c65 [backport v14]: fix(next/image): fix image-optimizer.ts headers (#82114) (#82...
  • 243072b v14.2.30
  • f523d4a [backport]: config.allowedDevOrigins (#80410)
  • ca92115 v14.2.29
  • ec9ee87 Only share incremental cache for edge in next start (#79389)
  • e65628a v14.2.28
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

topPRs.title: Bump brace-expansion from 1.1.11 to 1.1.12
topPRs.author: dependabot
topPRs.body:

Release notes

Sourced from brace-expansion's releases.

v1.1.12

  • fmt ccb8ac6
  • Fix potential ReDoS Vulnerability or Inefficient Regular Expression (#65) c3c73c8

https://github.com/juliangruber/brace-expansion/compare/v1.1.11...v1.1.12
